alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 02 at 3:23AM PST until February 03 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...The Shasta Valley, this includes Weed, Yreka, Grenada and Montague. * WHEN...From 1 PM Thursday to 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Driving a high profile vehicle on east to west roads may be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is potential for gusts up to 65 mph Thursday night into Friday morning around Weed. The chance of wind gusts higher than 55 mph is about 60 percent. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
